verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> Now it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַיָּ֕מָת <S%H4191><s%> died נָחָ֖שׁ <S%H5176><s%> that Nahash מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> and his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> I will shew חֶ֣סֶד ׀ <S%H2617><s%> kindness עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חָנ֣וּן <S%H2586><s%> unto Hanun בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נָחָ֗שׁ <S%H5176><s%> of Nahash כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> shewed אָבִ֤יו <S%H1><s%> because his father עִמִּי֙ <S%H5973><s%> with חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> to me And David מַלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers לְנַחֲמ֣וֹ <S%H5162><s%> to comfort עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> him concerning his father וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <S%H935><s%> came עַבְדֵ֨י <S%H5650><s%> So the servants דָוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֛וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חָנ֖וּן <S%H2586><s%> to Hanun לְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <S%H5162><s%> to comfort

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> said שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> But the princes בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon לְחָנ֗וּן <S%H2586><s%> to Hanun הַֽמְכַבֵּ֨ד <S%H3513><s%> doth honour דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> thou that David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> thy father בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> Thinkest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that he hath sent לְךָ֖ מְנַחֲמִ֑ים <S%H5162><s%> comforters הֲלֹ֡א <S%H3808><s%> not בַּ֠עֲבוּר <S%H5668><s%> to you לַחְקֹ֨ר <S%H2713><s%> unto thee for to search וְלַהֲפֹ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> and to overthrow וּלְרַגֵּל֙ <S%H7270><s%> and to spy out הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> common בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> come עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> unto thee? are not his servants אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about פ

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took חָנ֜וּן <S%H2586><s%> Wherefore Hanun אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> servants דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David's וַֽיְגַלְּחֵ֔ם <S%H1548><s%> and shaved וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> them and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַדְוֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H4063><s%> their garments בַּחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> in the midst עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַמִּפְשָׂעָ֑ה <S%H4667><s%> hard by their buttocks וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> and sent them away

וַיֵּלְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיַּגִּ֨ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> [certain] and told לְדָוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> how the men וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> were served And he sent לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <S%H7125><s%> to meet כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> them for the men נִכְלָמִ֣ים <S%H3637><s%> ashamed מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> were greatly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> And the king שְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> Tarry בִֽירֵח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> at Jericho עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יְצַמַּ֥ח <S%H6779><s%> be grown זְקַנְכֶ֖ם <S%H2206><s%> until your beards וְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H7725><s%> and [then] return

וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> themselves הִֽתְבָּאֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H887><s%> that they had made themselves odious עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> to David וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent חָ֠נוּן <S%H2586><s%> Hanun וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> and the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver לִשְׂכֹּ֣ר <S%H7936><s%> to hire לָ֠הֶם מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at אֲרַ֨ם נַהֲרַ֜יִם <S%H763><s%> out of Mesopotamia וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at אֲרַ֤ם <S%H758><s%> Aram מַעֲכָה֙ <S%H4601><s%> Maachah וּמִצּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H6678><s%> and out of Zobah רֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> them chariots וּפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen

וַיִּשְׂכְּר֣וּ <S%H7936><s%> So they hired לָהֶ֡ם שְׁנַיִם֩ <S%H8147><s%> and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand רֶ֗כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king מַעֲכָה֙ <S%H4601><s%> of Maachah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <S%H935><s%> who came וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before מֵידְבָ֑א <S%H4311><s%> Medeba וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children עַמּ֗וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon נֶאֶסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together מֵעָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> from their cities וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> to battle

וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> heard דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> And when David וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> [of it] he sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> and all the host הַגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men

וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> came out בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיַּֽעַרְכ֥וּ <S%H6186><s%> in array מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> and put the battle פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> before the gate הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְהַמְּלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> and the kings אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> that were come לְבַדָּ֖ם <S%H905><s%> themselves בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> [were] by themselves in the field

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> Now when Joab כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיְתָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become פְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> was set against him before הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> that the battle אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> against פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> front וְאָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> and behind וַיִּבְחַ֗ר <S%H977><s%> he chose out מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּחוּר֙ <S%H970><s%> the choice בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <S%H6186><s%> and put [them] in array לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7125><s%> against אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> the Syrians

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> And the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people נָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> he delivered בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> unto the hand אַבְשַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> of Abishai אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וַיַּ֣עַרְכ֔וּ <S%H6186><s%> and they set [themselves] in array לִקְרַ֖את <S%H7125><s%> against בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תֶּחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> be too strong מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <S%H4480><s%> are too אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> If the Syrians וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֖י לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H8668><s%> for me then thou shalt help ס וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> me but if the children עַמּ֛וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon יֶֽחֶזְק֥וּ <S%H2388><s%> be too strong מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> are too וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H3467><s%> for thee then I will help

חֲזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> Be of good courage וְנִֽתְחַזְּקָה֙ <S%H2388><s%> and let us behave ourselves valiantly בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> the sake עַמֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5971><s%> for our people וּבְעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> the sake עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and for the cities אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God וַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and let the LORD הַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that which is] good בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> in his sight יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> do

וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> that [were] with him drew nigh יוֹאָ֜ב <S%H3097><s%> So Joab וְהָעָ֧ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> the Syrians לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> unto the battle וַיָּנ֖וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> and they fled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children עַמּ֤וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon רָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָ֣ס <S%H5127><s%> were fled אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> that the Syrians וַיָּנ֣וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> they likewise fled גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before אַבְשַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> Abishai אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and entered הָעִ֑ירָה <S%H5892><s%> into the city וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came יוֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> Then Joab יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem פ

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> And when the Syrians כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נִגְּפוּ֮ <S%H5062><s%> that they were put to the worse לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> they sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and drew forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> the Syrians אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [were] beyond הַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> the river וְשׁוֹפַ֛ךְ <S%H7780><s%> and Shophach שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> of the host הֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> [went] before
